function_sets.name: Music - one and multi parameter functions with elaborative function description, no examples.

functions.name: artist_info
functions.description: Retrieves detailed information for a specified artist, including attributes like name, band status, formation/birth date, city, country, genres, and related artists.

artist_name.description: The name of the artist. Matches against the 'Name' column in the ARTIST_SQL dataset.

functions.name: album_info
functions.description: Fetches detailed information about a specific album, covering attributes such as album name, artist name, release date, genres, descriptors, average rating, rating count, and review count.

album_name.description: The name of the album. Matches against the 'release_name' column in the ALBUMS_SQL dataset.

functions.name: song_info
functions.description: Provides detailed information on a specific song, including track name, artist(s) name, album name, artist count, release date, streams, BPM, key, mode, danceability, valence, energy, acousticness, instrumentalness, liveness, speechiness, and duration in minutes.

song_name.description: The name of the song. Matches against the 'track_name' column in the SONGS_SQL dataset.

functions.name: albums_by_artist_2
functions.description: Retrieves all albums by a specific artist, searching through the 'artist_name' column in the ALBUMS_SQL dataset. It includes album name, artist name, release date, genres, descriptors, average rating, rating count, and review count.

artist_name.description: The artist's name to search albums for. The search is performed within the 'artist_name' column, supporting partial matches.

functions.name: artists_by_genres
functions.description: Finds artists that match any of the specified genres, utilizing the 'genres' column in the ARTIST_SQL dataset. It covers artist's name, is_band status, formation/birth date, city, country, genres, and related artists.

genres.description: List of genre strings to filter artists by. The filtering checks the 'genres' column for any matches.

functions.name: songs_by_album
functions.description: Retrieves all songs from a specific album, including details such as track name, artist(s) name, album name, artist count, release date, streams, and various musical and acoustic properties like BPM, danceability, and duration in minutes.

album_name.description: The name of the album to find songs for. Matches against the 'album_name' column in the SONGS_SQL dataset.

functions.name: max_rating_given_albums
functions.description: Finds the highest average rating from a list of specified albums. Returns the maximum average rating and the names of albums that share this rating. Relies on 'release_name' for album identification and 'avg_rating' for evaluation.

albums.description: A list of album names to evaluate. The function searches the 'release_name' column in the ALBUMS_SQL dataset.

functions.name: sum_streams_given_songs
functions.description: Calculates the total number of streams for a specified list of songs. Accepts either a list of song names or a single comma-separated string of song names. Utilizes the 'track_name' for song identification and 'streams' for summing.

songs.description: A list of song names, or a single string of comma-separated song names, to calculate total streams for. Matches against the 'track_name' column in the SONGS_SQL dataset.

functions.name: highest_rated_albums
functions.description: Retrieves albums that have an average rating above a specified threshold and a minimum number of ratings. Filters based on 'avg_rating' and 'rating_count' columns, providing detailed album information.

rating_threshold.description: The minimum average rating albums must meet to be included. Searches the 'avg_rating' column in the ALBUMS_SQL dataset.

min_ratings.description: The minimum number of ratings an album must have to be considered. Filters using the 'rating_count' column.

functions.name: albums_by_release_date_2
functions.description: Retrieves all albums released on a specific date, in a specific month, or in a specific year, based on the provided release date, searching through the 'release_date' column in the ALBUMS_SQL dataset. It includes album name, artist name, release date, genres, descriptors, average rating, rating count, and review count.

release_date.description: The release date to filter albums by. Can be in YYYY (year), YYYY-MM (year-month), or YYYY-MM-DD (specific date) format.

functions.name: songs_by_artist_2
functions.description: Retrieves all songs by a specific artist, searching through the 'artist(s)_name' column in the SONGS_SQL dataset,  including details such as track name, artist(s) name, album name, artist count, release date, streams, and various musical and acoustic properties like BPM, danceability, and duration in minutes.

artist_name.description: The artist's name to search songs for. The search is performed within the 'artist(s)_name' column, supporting partial matches.

function_sets.name: Music - 1 parameter functions with simple function description, no examples.

functions.name: albums_by_artist_1
functions.description: Returns all albums by a given artist.

functions.name: top_rated_albums
functions.description: Returns the top-rated albums based on average rating.

n.description: The number of albums to return. Default is 10.

functions.name: artist_by_album
functions.description: Returns the artist of an album by its name.

functions.name: albums_by_genres
functions.description: Retrieves a list of albums that contain any of the specified genres.

genres.description: A list of genre strings the albums must contain.

functions.name: albums_by_release_date_1
functions.description: Retrieves all albums released on a specific date.

release_date.description: The release date to filter albums by. Can be in YYYY (year), YYYY-MM (year-month), or YYYY-MM-DD (specific date) format.

functions.name: top_streamed_songs
functions.description: Returns the n most streamed songs.

n.description: The number of top-streamed songs to return. Default is 10.

functions.name: songs_by_release_date
functions.description: Retrieves all songs released on a specific date, in a specific month, or in a specific year, based on the provided release date.

release_date.description: The release date to filter songs by. Can be in YYYY (year), YYYY-MM (year-month), or YYYY-MM-DD (specific date) format.

functions.name: songs_by_longest_duration
functions.description: Returns the top 'n' songs sorted by their duration, from longest to shortest.

n.description: The number of top songs to return, based on duration. Defaults to 10 if not specified.

functions.name: artist_by_song
functions.description: Returns the artist of the song.

functions.name: songs_by_artist_1
functions.description: Returns all songs by a given artist.

function_sets.name: Music - Multi(>1) parameter functions with simple function description, no examples.

functions.name: filter_albums_by_date_range
functions.description: Filters and retrieves albums released within a specified date range. The range is inclusive of the start and end dates.

start_date.description: The start date of the date range for filtering albums. Can be in YYYY, YYYY-MM, or YYYY-MM-DD format.

end_date.description: The end date of the date range for filtering albums. Can be in YYYY, YYYY-MM, or YYYY-MM-DD format.

functions.name: albums_by_genres2
functions.description: Retrieves albums that match specified inclusion and exclusion genre criteria.

genres_in.description: A list of genre strings the albums must contain.

genres_out.description: A list of genre strings the albums must not contain.

functions.name: albums_by_date_and_genres
functions.description: Retrieves albums released on a specific date, in a specific month, or in a specific year that match any of the specified genres.

release_date.description: The release date of the albums. Can be in YYYY, YYYY-MM, or YYYY-MM-DD format.

genres.description: A list of genre strings to filter albums by.

functions.name: high_rated_albums
functions.description: Retrieves albums with an average rating above a specified threshold and a minimum number of ratings.

rating_threshold.description: The minimum average rating for the albums. Defaults to 4.0 if not specified.

min_ratings.description: The minimum number of ratings an album must have. Defaults to 100 if not specified.

functions.name: top_streamed_songs_by_artist
functions.description: Retrieves the top streamed songs by specific artist, sorted by number of streams.

n.description: The number of top-streamed songs to return. Defaults to 5 if not specified.

functions.name: songs_by_danceability_explicitness
functions.description: Retrieves songs that meet a specified danceability threshold and explicitness criteria.

danceability_threshold.description: The minimum danceability rating (percentage) to filter songs by.

explicit.description: Flag to filter songs by explicit content. Defaults to True if not specified.

functions.name: albums_by_year_genres_and_descriptors
functions.description: Retrieves albums released on a specific date, month, or year, that fit within specified genres and match given descriptors.

release_date.description: Release date to filter albums by, in YYYY, YYYY-MM, or YYYY-MM-DD format.

genres.description: List of genres to filter albums by.

descriptors.description: List of descriptors to match albums with.

functions.name: high_rated_reviewed_albums
functions.description: Retrieves albums that meet specific criteria of high average ratings, a minimum number of ratings, and a minimum number of reviews.

rating_threshold.description: The minimum average rating for the albums.

min_ratings.description: The minimum number of ratings an album must have.

review_threshold.description: The minimum number of reviews an album must have.

functions.name: songs_by_danceability_explicitness_speechiness
functions.description: Retrieves songs based on specified thresholds for danceability, speechiness, and explicit content criteria.

danceability_threshold.description: The minimum danceability rating (percentage) to filter songs by.

speechiness_threshold.description: The minimum speechiness rating (percentage) to filter songs by.

explicit.description: Flag to filter songs by explicit content. Defaults to True if not specified.

functions.name: top_streamed_songs_by_artist_date
functions.description: Retrieves the top streamed songs by a specific artist, released on a given date, month, or year.

artist_name.description: The name of the artist whose songs are to be retrieved.

release_date.description: The release date of the songs to filter by, in YYYY, YYYY-MM, or YYYY-MM-DD format.

n.description: The number of top-streamed songs to return. Defaults to 5 if not specified.

functions.name: unique_albums
functions.description: Finds albums that are distinctive in terms of genre diversity and artist collaboration but have lower average ratings.

genres_threshold.description: The minimum number of genres an album must cover.

artist_count_threshold.description: The minimum number of artists required to be involved in an album.

max_rating_threshold.description: The maximum average rating that an album can have.

functions.name: albums_by_dates_genres_rating
functions.description: Retrieves albums released within a specific date range, filtered by genres to include and exclude, and having an average rating above a specified minimum threshold.

start_date.description: The start date of the date range for filtering albums, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

end_date.description: The end date of the date range for filtering albums, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

genre_in.description: List of genres that the albums must include.

genre_out.description: List of genres that the albums must not include.

min_rating.description: The minimum average rating threshold for the albums.

functions.name: high_rated_reviewed_albums_by_date
functions.description: Retrieves albums that exceed a certain rating threshold, have a minimum number of ratings and reviews, and are released on a specified date.

rating_threshold.description: The minimum average rating for the albums.

min_ratings.description: The minimum number of ratings an album must have.

review_threshold.description: The minimum number of reviews an album must have.

release_date.description: The release date of the albums, in YYYY, YYYY-MM, or YYYY-MM-DD format.

functions.name: top_streamed_songs_by_artist_date_range
functions.description: Finds the top streamed songs by a specific artist within a given date range, and returns a specified number of these top songs.

artist_name.description: The name of the artist whose songs are to be retrieved.

start_date.description: The start date of the date range for filtering songs, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

end_date.description: The end date of the date range for filtering songs, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

n.description: The number of top-streamed songs to return. Defaults to 5 if not specified.

functions.name: speechiness_songs
functions.description: Finds songs based on specific criteria of speechiness, energy, explicit content, and BPM, allowing a tolerance range for speechiness and energy values.

speechiness.description: Target threshold for speechiness with an acceptable deviation defined by the threshold.

energy.description: Target threshold for energy with an acceptable deviation defined by the threshold.

explicit.description: Flag indicating whether to filter for explicit content.

bpm.description: Target Beats Per Minute (BPM) to filter songs by.

threshold.description: Range value to determine the acceptable deviation from the speechiness and energy thresholds. Defaults to 20 if not specified.

functions.name: instrumental_songs
functions.description: Identifies songs based on specified levels of instrumentalness, valence, danceability, and BPM, with a tolerance range for each parameter.

instrumentalness.description: Target threshold for instrumentalness, with a specified deviation range.

valence.description: Target threshold for valence, with a specified deviation range.

danceability.description: Target threshold for danceability, with a specified deviation range.

bpm.description: Target Beats Per Minute (BPM) to filter songs by.

threshold.description: Range value to determine the acceptable deviation from the instrumentalness, valence, and danceability thresholds.

function_sets.name: Music - 1 parameter functions with complex function description, no examples.

functions.description: Fetches the singer who released a stated collection.

functions.description: Retrieves a list of records that can be classified to be of the specified category/type.

genres.description: A list of genre strings the albums must contain.

functions.name: albums_by_release_date_1
functions.description: Retrieves all collections launched during a particular timeframe.

release_date.description: The release date to filter albums by. Can be in YYYY (year), YYYY-MM (year-month), or YYYY-MM-DD (specific date) format.

functions.name: top_streamed_songs

n.description: The number of top-streamed songs to return. Default is 10.

functions.name: songs_by_release_date
functions.description: Retrieves all musical pieces launched during a particular timeframe.

release_date.description: The release date to filter songs by. Can be in YYYY (year), YYYY-MM (year-month), or YYYY-MM-DD (specific date) format.

functions.name: songs_by_longest_duration
functions.description: Retrieves the n highest-ranking tunes arranged by their length.

n.description: The number of top songs to return, based on duration. Defaults to 10 if not specified.

functions.name: artist_by_song
functions.description: Fetches the performer who released a stated track.

functions.name: songs_by_artist_1
functions.description: Retrieves the music recordings that have been released by the specified singer.
